Uses of Package
jmines.view.dialogs

Packages that use jmines.view.dialogs
jmines.control.actions.game This package contains all the action objects used to construct the game menu of the main frame menu bar. 
jmines.control.actions.info This package contains all the action objects used to construct the info menu of the main frame menu bar. 
jmines.control.actions.robot This package contains all the action objects used to construct the robot menu of the main frame menu bar. 
jmines.control.listeners This package contains all the objects used to listen the user events on the main and game panels. 
jmines.view.dialogs This package contains all the dialogs classes : to display JMines information, to display best times, to create a custom game and to enter user name. 
 

Classes in jmines.view.dialogs used by jmines.control.actions.game
BestTimesDialog
          The dialog used to display the best player times.
CustomDialog
          This class is used to display dialog for the users who want to play a game with personalized number of lines, columns, and mines.
 

Classes in jmines.view.dialogs used by jmines.control.actions.info
AboutDialog
          The dialog used to display information about JMines.
ThanksDialog
          The dialog used to display thanks for JMines.
 

Classes in jmines.view.dialogs used by jmines.control.actions.robot
StatisticsDialog
          The dialog used to display the statistics.
 

Classes in jmines.view.dialogs used by jmines.control.listeners
AboutDialog
          The dialog used to display information about JMines.
BestTimesDialog
          The dialog used to display the best player times.
ConfigurationFrame
          The frame used to display information about JMines.
CustomDialog
          This class is used to display dialog for the users who want to play a game with personalized number of lines, columns, and mines.
NameDialog
          The dialog used to ask the user when name when he win a game.
RobotNameDialog
          The dialog used to ask the user when name when he win a game.
StatisticsDialog
          The dialog used to display the statistics.
ThanksDialog
          The dialog used to display thanks for JMines.
 

Classes in jmines.view.dialogs used by jmines.view.dialogs

          An object representation of the dialog return.
